TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowMarkupSerializer extends System.Object

summary.span: 在設計階段為工作流程提供 eXtensible Application Markup Language (XAML) 序列化 (Serialization) 服務。

span.span: Provides the extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) serialization services to workflows at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 會提供方法，可用來將工作流程和 類別序列化為 XAML 格式，並將 XAML 內容還原序列化為工作流程和活動類別物件。 provides methods that serialize workflow and classes into XAML format and deserialize XAML content into workflow and activity class objects. 這些服務主要是由工作流程設計工具用來保存工作流程設計介面上的類別。These services are primarily used by workflow designers to persist the classes on the workflow design surface. 是 命名空間中所有標記序列化程式的基底類別。 is the base class for all markup serializers included in the namespace. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[序列化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d1111c0-9447-4231-a997-96a2b74b3453)。For more information, see [Serialization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d1111c0-9447-4231-a997-96a2b74b3453). 不支援序列化巢狀型別。 does not support serialization of nested types. 的功能與 Windows Workflow Foundation 外面之其他型別的功能相依。The functionality of is dependent on functionality of other types outside of Windows Workflow Foundation. 基於這些其他型別的限制，並非所有資料型別都可以透過 進行序列化。Based on the limitations of those other types, not all data types can be serialized through the . 以下是一些不支援的型別的範例清單。The following is a list is an example of some unsupported types. > [!NOTE] > 這並非不支援型別的完整清單。This is not an exhaustive and complete list of unsupported types. 陣列 (只有當屬性 (Property) 不是以 `DesignerSerializationVisibility.Content` 屬性 (Attribute) 值裝飾時，才會支援)Arrays (supported only if property is not decorated with `DesignerSerializationVisibility.Content` attribute value) 不含無參數之建構函式的型別Types without parameterless constructors 多維陣列Multidimensional Arrays 泛型型別 (只有當屬性 (Property) 以 `List` 屬性 (Attribute) 值裝飾時，才會支援 `Dictionary` 和 `DesignerSerializationVisibility.Content` 泛型型別)Generic types (Generic `List` and `Dictionary` types supported only if property is decorated with `DesignerSerializationVisibility.Content` attribute value) `Hashtable` `Queue` `Stack` `XmlDocument` `MailMessage` `Bitmap` 列舉陣列Enumeration Arrays 以 FlagsAttribute 裝飾的列舉型別Enumerations decorated with the FlagsAttribute 除了這個清單外，`ContentPropertyAttibute` 無法針對同時使用 `DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute` 和 `WorkflowMarkupSerializer` 裝飾的任何屬性序列化。In addition to this list, any property decorated with both the `ContentPropertyAttibute` and the `DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute` cannot be serialized by `WorkflowMarkupSerializer`.

public: WorkflowMarkupSerializer();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立 類別的新執行個體。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the class. 這個程式碼範例是 Loader.cs 檔案中 OutlookWorkflowWizard SDK 範例的一部分。This code example is part of the OutlookWorkflowWizard SDK Sample from the Loader.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Outlook 工作流程精靈](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b2ba92b-8456-43f3-87fc-184ffdec4408)。For more information, see [Outlook Workflow Wizard](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b2ba92b-8456-43f3-87fc-184ffdec4408). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#97](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#97)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#97](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets1.vb#97)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在執行 方法之後，立即呼叫 。 is called immediately after the method runs. 您可以在繼承 的類別中覆寫 ，如此，即可在 `obj` 序列化為 eXtensible Application Markup Language (XAML) 之後執行任何必要的處理。You can override in a class that inherits to perform any required processing on `obj` after it has been serialized to extensible Application Markup Language (XAML). 不會提供任何預設行為。 provides no default behavior. 您必須在衍生類別中覆寫它，以加入任何處理邏輯。You must override it in a derived class to add any processing logic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在執行 方法之前，立即呼叫 。 is called immediately before the method runs. 您可以在繼承 的類別中覆寫 ，如此，即可在 `obj` 序列化為 eXtensible Application Markup Language (XAML) 之前執行任何必要的處理。You can override in a class that inherits to perform required processing on `obj` before it is serialized to extensible Application Markup Language (XAML). 不會提供任何預設行為。 provides no default behavior. 您必須在衍生類別中覆寫它，以加入任何處理邏輯。You must override it in a derived class to add any processing logic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在執行 方法之前，立即呼叫 。 is called immediately before the method runs. 您可以在繼承 的類別中覆寫 ，以便在序列化程序中的 `obj` 步驟開始之前，在 上執行任何必要的處理。You can override in a class that inherits to perform required processing on `obj` before it the step in the serialization process has begun. 不會提供任何預設行為。 provides no default behavior. 您必須在衍生類別中覆寫它，以加入任何處理邏輯。You must override it in a derived class to add any processing logic.

summary.span: 將 序列化為 eXtensible Application Markup Language (XAML) 格式。

span.span: Serializes an into extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的功能與 Windows Workflow Foundation 外面之其他型別的功能相依。The functionality of is dependent on functionality of other types outside of Windows Workflow Foundation. 基於這些其他型別的限制，並非所有資料型別都可以透過 進行序列化。Based on the limitations of those other types, not all data types can be serialized through the . 以下是一些不支援的型別清單。The following is a list of some unsupported types. > [!NOTE] > 這並非不支援型別的完整清單。This is not an exhaustive and complete list of unsupported types. 陣列 (只有當屬性 (Property) 以 `DesignerSerializationVisibility.Content` 屬性 (Attribute) 值裝飾時，才會支援)Arrays (supported only if property is decorated with `DesignerSerializationVisibility.Content` attribute value) 無參數的建構函式Parameterless Constructors 多維陣列Multidimensional Arrays 泛型型別 (只有當屬性 (Property) 以 `List` 屬性 (Attribute) 值裝飾時，才會支援 `Dictionary` 和 `DesignerSerializationVisibility.Content` 泛型型別)Generic types (Generic `List` and `Dictionary` types supported only if property is decorated with `DesignerSerializationVisibility.Content` attribute value) `Hashtable` `Queue` `Stack` `XmlDocument` `MailMessage` `Bitmap` 列舉陣列Enumeration Arrays 除了這個清單外，`ContentPropertyAttibute` 無法針對同時使用 `DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute` 和 `WorkflowMarkupSerializer` 裝飾的任何屬性序列化。In addition to this list, any property decorated with both the `ContentPropertyAttibute` and the `DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute` cannot be serialized by `WorkflowMarkupSerializer`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須在以程式設計方式建立的工作流程中序列化工作流程型別的新執行個體或根活動，才能建立可以在 中用來建立 的工作流程標記。You must serialize either a new instance of a workflow type or the root activity in a programmatically-created workflow to create workflow markup that can be used in to create a . 如需有關工作流程標記的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用工作流程標記](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e2693a12-640b-4ccb-8fb0-db3075e94aa4)。For more information about workflow markup, see [Using Workflow Markup](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e2693a12-640b-4ccb-8fb0-db3075e94aa4).

span.span: The that manages the serialization process.
The to serialize to a string.

summary.span: 將指定的 序列化為字串。

span.span: Serializes the specified to a string.
A string that contains the serialized .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 執行個體可以從 `value` 指派，則 會將與 `value` 相關聯的方法名稱寫入字串。If a instance is assignable from `value`, writes the method name associated with `value` to a string. 如果 執行個體可以從 `value` 指派，則 會將與 `value` 相關聯之型別的完整限定名稱寫入字串。If a instance is assignable from `value`, writes the fully-qualified name of the type associated with `value` to a string. 如果上述情況不存在，則 會將 `value` 轉換成字串並寫入結果。If neither of these conditions exist, converts `value` to a string and writes the result.

exception.span: 或 包含 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是由 在序列化指定的物件之前呼叫的。 is called by before it serializes the specified object. 如果 `false` 包含 null 參考 (`value`)，或者 `Nothing` 與目前序列化內容的 `value` 相等，則此方法會傳回 。The method returns `false` if `value` contains a null reference (`Nothing`) or if `value` and the of the current serialization context are equal. 您可以覆寫繼承自 之類別中的 ，以自訂是否應該序列化指定之物件的判斷方式。You can override in a class that inherits from to customize how to determine whether the specified object should be serialized.

summary.span: 表示附加的 ，此物件會定義會在編譯期間建立的型別名稱。

span.span: Represents an attached that defines the type name, which will be created during compilation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個值對應到 XAML 中的 `x:Class` 屬性。This value corresponds to `x:Class` attribute in XAML. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用工作流程標記](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e2693a12-640b-4ccb-8fb0-db3075e94aa4)。For more information, see [Using Workflow Markup](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e2693a12-640b-4ccb-8fb0-db3075e94aa4). 這個屬性只在設計階段使用。This property is used only at design time. 編譯後，它就會變成編譯型別的名稱。After compilation, it becomes the name of the compiled type. [!INCLUDE[DependencyPropertyRemark](~/includes/dependencypropertyremark-md.md)]

staticval mutable XCodeProperty : System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty

summary.span: 表示內嵌於 XAML 項目的程式碼範例。

span.span: Represents a code example, embedded into XAML element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以程式設計方式使用物件模型 (Object Model) 發出工作流程時，這個屬性只能在設計階段使用。This property is used only at design time, while programmatically emitting a workflow using the object model. 屬性包含填入 `CodeTypeMemberCollection` 項目的 `CodeSnippetTypeMember` 集合。The property contains a `CodeTypeMemberCollection` collection filled with `CodeSnippetTypeMember` elements. 編譯後，程式碼就會編譯為產生之型別的一部分。After compilation, the code is compiled as a part of the generated type. [!INCLUDE[DependencyPropertyRemark](~/includes/dependencypropertyremark-md.md)] ## Examples 下列範例是 XAML 程式碼，其中包含可以在工作流程編譯期間編譯的程式碼範例。The following example is XAML code that contains a code example that would be compiled during workflow compilation. ```
